name: Save The Forest (itch) (Campfire)
description:
Controls W, A, S, DMoves CameraLeft MouseInteract

Save The Forest is a simple  game where you try to save forests by growing trees, you can buy tiles with water and start collecting those Nature Points to win the game.

This was made by two Beginner Developers for Kenney Jam 2022 in  2 days. All assets were provided by Kenney.
